summary:
Features, Full Physics, Fit this outfit perfectly to all UNP bodies, all Sevenbase, all UNPB, Demonphet, Seraphim, Top Model, DG, and many many more.
Everybody, Everytime, and Everywhere in game with Racemenu Morph Support. Full Theme Pack Support!
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/69597-0-1441941644.jpg[/img]
[b]UUNP Daedric Reaper Armor Slider [/b][/size][/center]

[size=4]
[/size][center][size=3][color=#0066cc][color=#0066cc]Daedric Reaper Armor for Skyrim [/color][/color]was designed and textured by "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3373573][u][color=#0066cc][size=4]Nsk13[/size][/color][/u][/url][/size][b]"

The meshes here are Re-Mastered by "[/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2205977][u][color=#0066cc][size=4]Gamefever[/size][/color][/u][/url][b]" to give the end-user a form fitting outfit for all body types in the UUNP System.

Tools used by "[/b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2205977][u][color=#0066cc]gamefever[/color][/u][/url] [b]"
[/b][color=#0066cc][size=3]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/size][/color][b] by [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686][u][color=#0066cc][size=3]Caliente[/size][/color][/u][/url] [b]and [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4291759][u][color=#0066cc][size=3]Ousnius[/size][/color][/u][/url] [b]
Blender
Nifskope
Meshrigger[/b][/center][b]
[/b]

[b][u][size=4]Features
[/size][/u][/b]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/69597-0-1442775382.jpg[/img]

Fit them to any UNP variant, UNPB variant, Sevenbase variant, Demonfet, Saraphim, Top Model, Dream Girl, Venus....50 bodies all perfectly everytime each time.

Fomod Instalation! (Fully Easy Peasy)
Play Immediately and use "showracemenu" to adjust your outfit to your preferred specifications or Bodyslide it yourself!
Full Theme Pack Support!
Full Physics Weight Painting and Non-Physics Options.
No Clipping
Skin Tight Leggings, Hosery, and Undies
Racemenu Morph Support
Make any type of UNP body variant in seconds without any fuss.
Slide the outfits to fit any UNP body in  Bodyslide or Slide it in real time in game with Racemenu Morphs Pluggin
Slide your favorite outfit today with total confidence that it will work everytime with a Gamefever UUNP slider.
[size=4]
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/69597-0-1442018797.jpg[/img]
[size=2]Photo by SayonaraAi
[/size]

[/size][size=4][u]Requirements

[/u][/size][size=3]Bodyslide Outfit Studio 2.0 [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/][u][color=#0066cc][size=3]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/[/size][/color][/u][/url][size=3]?
->Be sure to install the UUNP Racemenu Option[/size]
[size=3]Racemenu  [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/][u][color=#0066cc][size=3]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/[/size][/color][/u][/url][size=3]?
XPMS Extended (for Morph menu in game and skeleton of course) [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/][u][color=#0066cc][size=3]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/[/size][/color][/u][/url][size=3]?[/size]
[size=3]Physics XML (in Files under options, has enabled femalehead.nif no more havoc object for you my friend)
[/size]

[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/69597-0-1442019423.jpg[/img]
[size=4][b][u]
Installation
[/u][/b]
Requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3373573][u][color=#0066cc]Nsk13[/color][/u][/url]'s original mod here [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69138/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69138/[/url]?[color=#0066cc][u]
[/u][/color][/size][size=3]
[b][u]Known Issue's
[/u][/b]Cannot Morph  Gauntlets in Real Time without causeing a crash with some versions of XP32E skeleton, I have no idea why,
Workaround simply remove the Gauntlets before you Morph the Body and then put them on.
This does not appear to be something I can fix on my end.

[b][u]Credits[/u][/b]
[/size][color=#ebf1dd][size=4][i]Cuirass [/i][/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68028/?][u][color=#0066cc][size=4][i]UNP Spice Gear Collection by tiwa44[/i][/size][/color][/u][/url]
[color=#ebf1dd][size=4][i]Skirt [/i][/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11767/?][u][color=#0066cc][size=4][i]Dragons Crown Sorceress Outfit for UNP by Backsteppo[/i][/size][/color][/u][/url]
[color=#ebf1dd][size=4][i]Choker [/i][/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15529/?][u][color=#0066cc][size=4][i]R18Pn Set - Inner Wear Set for UNP and CBBEV3 by NPR[/i][/size][/color][/u][/url]
[color=#ebf1dd][size=4][i]Leggings [/i][/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24444/?][i][u][color=#0066cc][size=4]UNP Undies by Petrovich[/size][/color][/u][/i][/url]




[size=4][b][u]Want more sliders by [/u][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2205977][color=#0066cc][size=4][u]Gamefever[/u][/size][/color][/url][b][u]? [/u][/b]

[/size][size=4][size=2][color=#0066cc][u]Immersive First Person Combat Items Fix [/u][u]or Skyrim [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68776/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68776/[/url]?
[/u][/color][color=#0066cc][u]ChronoTrigger77's Remodeled Armor for UUNP Bodyslide HDT [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69562/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69562/[/url]?[/u][u]
[/u][/color][color=#0066cc][u][color=#0066cc]Merta Assasin, BlackRose, Sotteta Huntress, Necromancer, and Tembtra Thief UUNP Bodyslide [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68670/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68670/[/url]?
[/color][/u][u][color=#0066cc]Gwelda Armor Pack and Riding Hood UUNP Bodyslide [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68608/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68608/[/url]?[/color][/u]
[u]UUNP Cassandra Frost Witch Slider Set GF [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68748/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68748/[/url]?[/u][/color][/size][/size][size=4]
[/size][color=#0066cc][u]Emfy Cleric for UUNP Bodyslide HDT [/u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69713/][u]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69713/[/u][/url][u]?
[/u][/color][color=#0066cc][u]Ancient Draugr UUNP Bodyslide HDT [/u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69740/][u]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69740/[/u][/url][u]?
[/u][/color][u][color=#0066cc]Wild Huntress UUNP Bodyslide HDT [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69758/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69758/[/url]?
[/color][/u]Ursine Armor Pack for UUNP Bodyslide HDT [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69762/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69762/[/url]?
[size=2]MiniDresses Collection UUNP Bodyslide [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69880/][u]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69880/[/u][/url]?

[/size]

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/69597-0-1442857661.jpg[/img]
photo by Eiries "UUNP 7B Bombshell" made with this slider


[center][b][u][size=4]What Others have said about my Slider Sets
[/size][/u][/b]
[size=2][i]"First of all, thanks for taking your time to make this, i know how much work this is [img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/smile.gif[/img]" T3hoth3r

"Hey man! Just wanted to let you know I downloaded your latest version, installed and it works like a charm! Thank you for your hard work! it really shows!"  J450n[/i]

[i]"OMG this is so AWESOME !!!!!!!!Thanks for working so hard to make these they work perfectly in BS and in game.
Thank you [img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/biggrin.gif[/img] "[/i][/size][i] [size=2]JQdude[/size]              

"First of all thanks for doing all this fantastic work. I haven't been able to find any clipping at all. I stand in awe because most of my own UUNP conversion projects end in a clipping disaster." Melanch

[/i][size=2][i]"Ha - The savior of my day.  Thanks, man - again!" Nermal_66

"Mate, I love your sliders. Just downloaded them all. Can't wait for the other, especially for Emfy. Fully endorsed." Slowyoa 

"Top quality work. Thank you kindly!" Dabrienni

"Thanks to you I've now got one of the very best armor collections all nicely merged and working flawlessly with RaceMenu morphs. Great effort, thanks for sharing." B3ast1e
"[/i]so much quality UUNP stuff in such short time. how long would it take you to convert rickerhk's Remodeled for SeveNBase? two weeks? [img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/biggrin.gif[/img]
just kidding. i'm greatful for every UUNP set. it's just the better bodyslide body." YPS

"Thanks again, GF! You da bess!" Jtenma

"Thanks so much!" Mazzyfireball


[size=4]Thank you for all the wonderful comments these are the things I read when the work gets tough.




[/size][/size][size=2][size=4]But Don't take our word for it, here's the opinion of a famous You Tube Personality[/size] (Factual Opinion Pending)
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/68670-1-1439492071.jpg[/img]
[s]"Tight Fit"[/s] That's not what your thinking.


 
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/68670-0-1439492071.jpg[/img]
Form Fitting, you know that landing an Imperial Star Destroyer there isn't going to happen.[/size][/center]
